short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates specific links to Discussion entries

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A new browser extension that creates links to specific entries in discussion threads in the Canvas learning platform. These links can be used to create bookmarks to specific posts in the thread. The extension can also create a linked index list of the entries at the top of the page.

Please note: Presently, only Canvas spaces hosted by domains of the type 
*.instructure.com/* 
can use the extension, with the addition of the following:
canvas.gu.se/*

If you wish to have another host URL incorporated in the list of supported hosts, please write a request to cmc.extension@gmail.com.
